parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns whether water is at given position.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''surfaceIsWater''' position

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position2D]]  or [[Position3D]] in which case Z will be ignored

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isWater= [[surfaceIsWater]] [1000, 3000];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_isWater = [[surfaceIsWater]] [[position]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[surfaceType]], [[surfaceNormal]], [[nearRoads]], [[roadsConnectedTo]], [[roadAt]], [[isOnRoad]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 4 May, 2012</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Osmo|Osmo]]<dd class="note">
Does not work with inland water. Works only with sea water.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
